26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_TILE_OP_BINARY_WRAPPER_H__INCLUDED
27 #define TILEDARRAY_TILE_OP_BINARY_WRAPPER_H__INCLUDED

29 #include <TiledArray/permutation.h>
30 #include <TiledArray/tile_op/tile_interface.h>
31 #include <TiledArray/zero_tensor.h>

33 namespace TiledArray {
34 namespace detail {
35 
37 
93 template <typename Op>
94 class BinaryWrapper {
95  public:
96  typedef BinaryWrapper<Op> BinaryWrapper_;
97  typedef typename Op::left_type left_type;
98  typedef typename Op::right_type right_type;
99  typedef typename Op::result_type result_type;
100 
102  static constexpr bool left_is_consumable = Op::left_is_consumable;
105  static constexpr bool right_is_consumable = Op::right_is_consumable;
106 
107  template <typename T>
108  static constexpr bool is_lazy_tile_v = is_lazy_tile<std::decay_t<T> >::value;
109 
110  template <typename T>
111  static constexpr bool is_array_tile_v =
112  is_array_tile<std::decay_t<T> >::value;
113 
114  template <typename T>
115  static constexpr bool is_nonarray_lazy_tile_v =
116  is_lazy_tile_v<T> && !is_array_tile_v<T>;
117 
118  template <typename T>
119  using eval_t = typename eval_trait<std::decay_t<T> >::type;
120 
121  private:
122  Op op_;
123  Permutation perm_;
124 
125  public:
126  // Compiler generated functions
127  BinaryWrapper(const BinaryWrapper<Op>&) = default;
128  BinaryWrapper(BinaryWrapper<Op>&&) = default;
129  ~BinaryWrapper() = default;
130  BinaryWrapper<Op>& operator=(const BinaryWrapper<Op>&) = default;
131  BinaryWrapper<Op>& operator=(BinaryWrapper<Op>&&) = default;
132 
133  BinaryWrapper(const Op& op, const Permutation& perm) : op_(op), perm_(perm) {}
134 
135  BinaryWrapper(const Op& op) : op_(op), perm_() {}
136 
138 
145  template <typename L, typename R,
146  std::enable_if_t<
147  !(is_lazy_tile_v<L> || is_lazy_tile_v<R>)&&!std::is_same<
148  std::decay_t<L>, ZeroTensor>::value &&
149  !std::is_same<std::decay_t<R>, ZeroTensor>::value>* = nullptr>
150  auto operator()(L&& left, R&& right) const {
151  static_assert(
152  std::is_same<std::decay_t<L>, left_type>::value,
153  "BinaryWrapper::operator()(L&&,R&&): invalid argument type L");
154  static_assert(
155  std::is_same<std::decay_t<R>, right_type>::value,
156  "BinaryWrapper::operator()(L&&,R&&): invalid argument type R");
157  if (perm_) return op_(std::forward<L>(left), std::forward<R>(right), perm_);
158 
159  return op_(std::forward<L>(left), std::forward<R>(right));
160  }
161 
163 
170  template <typename R, std::enable_if_t<!is_lazy_tile_v<R> >* = nullptr>
171  auto operator()(const ZeroTensor& left, R&& right) const {
172  static_assert(
173  std::is_same<std::decay_t<R>, right_type>::value,
174  "BinaryWrapper::operator()(zero,R&&): invalid argument type R");
175  if (perm_) return op_(left, std::forward<R>(right), perm_);
176 
177  return op_(left, std::forward<R>(right));
178  }
179 
181 
188  template <typename L, std::enable_if_t<!is_lazy_tile_v<L> >* = nullptr>
189  auto operator()(L&& left, const ZeroTensor& right) const {
190  static_assert(
191  std::is_same<std::decay_t<L>, left_type>::value,
192  "BinaryWrapper::operator()(L&&,zero): invalid argument type L");
193  if (perm_) return op_(std::forward<L>(left), right, perm_);
194 
195  return op_(std::forward<L>(left), right);
196  }
197 
198  // The following operators will evaluate lazy tile and use the base class
199  // interface functions to call the correct evaluation kernel.
200 
202 
212  template <
213  typename L, typename R,
214  std::enable_if_t<is_lazy_tile_v<L> && is_lazy_tile_v<R> &&
215  (left_is_consumable || right_is_consumable)>* = nullptr>
216  auto operator()(L&& left, R&& right) const {
217  auto eval_left = invoke_cast(std::forward<L>(left));
218  auto eval_right = invoke_cast(std::forward<R>(right));
219  auto continuation = [this](decltype(eval_left)& l,
220  decltype(eval_right)& r) {
221  return BinaryWrapper_::operator()(l, r);
222  };
223  return meta::invoke(continuation, eval_left, eval_right);
224  }
225 
227 
237  template <
238  typename L, typename R,
239  std::enable_if_t<is_lazy_tile_v<L> &&
240  (!is_lazy_tile_v<R>)&&(left_is_consumable ||
241  right_is_consumable)>* = nullptr>
242  auto operator()(L&& left, R&& right) const {
243  auto eval_left = invoke_cast(std::forward<L>(left));
244  auto continuation = [this](decltype(eval_left)& l, R&& r) {
245  return BinaryWrapper_::operator()(l, std::forward<R>(r));
246  };
247  return meta::invoke(continuation, eval_left, right);
248  }
249 
251 
261  template <
262  typename L, typename R,
263  std::enable_if_t<(!is_lazy_tile_v<L>)&&is_lazy_tile_v<R> &&
264  (left_is_consumable || right_is_consumable)>* = nullptr>
265  auto operator()(L&& left, R&& right) const {
266  auto eval_right = invoke_cast(std::forward<R>(right));
267  return BinaryWrapper_::operator()(std::forward<L>(left), eval_right);
268  }
269 
271 
280  template <
281  typename L, typename R,
282  std::enable_if_t<is_array_tile_v<L> && is_array_tile_v<R> &&
283  !(left_is_consumable || right_is_consumable)>* = nullptr>
284  auto operator()(L&& left, R&& right) const {
285  auto eval_left = invoke_cast(std::forward<L>(left));
286  auto eval_right = invoke_cast(std::forward<R>(right));
287 
288  if (perm_) return meta::invoke(op_, eval_left, eval_right, perm_);
289 
290  auto op_left = [=](eval_t<L>& _left, eval_t<R>& _right) {
291  return op_.consume_left(_left, _right);
292  };
293  auto op_right = [=](eval_t<L>& _left, eval_t<R>& _right) {
294  return op_.consume_right(_left, _right);
295  };
296  // Override consumable
297  if (is_consumable_tile<eval_t<L> >::value && left.is_consumable())
298  return meta::invoke(op_left, eval_left, eval_right);
299  if (is_consumable_tile<eval_t<R> >::value && right.is_consumable())
300  return meta::invoke(op_right, eval_left, eval_right);
301 
302  return meta::invoke(op_, eval_left, eval_right);
303  }
304 
305  template <
306  typename L, typename R,
307  std::enable_if_t<is_array_tile_v<L> &&
308  (!is_lazy_tile_v<R>)&&!(left_is_consumable ||
309  right_is_consumable)>* = nullptr>
310  auto operator()(L&& left, R&& right) const {
311  auto eval_left = invoke_cast(std::forward<L>(left));
312 
313  if (perm_) return op_(eval_left, std::forward<R>(right), perm_);
314 
315  // Override consumable
316  if (is_consumable_tile<eval_t<L> >::value && left.is_consumable())
317  return op_.consume_left(eval_left, std::forward<R>(right));
318 
319  return op_(eval_left, std::forward<R>(right));
320  }
321 
322  template <
323  typename L, typename R,
324  std::enable_if_t<is_array_tile_v<L> && is_nonarray_lazy_tile_v<R> &&
325  !(left_is_consumable || right_is_consumable)>* = nullptr>
326  auto operator()(L&& left, R&& right) const {
327  auto eval_left = invoke_cast(std::forward<L>(left));
328  auto eval_right = invoke_cast(std::forward<R>(right));
329 
330  if (perm_) return op_(eval_left, eval_right, perm_);
331 
332  // Override consumable
333  if (is_consumable_tile<eval_t<L> >::value && left.is_consumable())
334  return op_.consume_left(eval_left, eval_right);
335 
336  return op_(eval_left, eval_right);
337  }
338 
339  template <
340  typename L, typename R,
341  std::enable_if_t<(!is_lazy_tile_v<L>)&&is_array_tile_v<R> &&
342  !(left_is_consumable || right_is_consumable)>* = nullptr>
343  auto operator()(L&& left, R&& right) const {
344  auto eval_right = invoke_cast(std::forward<R>(right));
345 
346  if (perm_) return op_(std::forward<L>(left), eval_right, perm_);
347 
348  // Override consumable
349  if (is_consumable_tile<eval_t<R> >::value && right.is_consumable())
350  return op_.consume_right(std::forward<L>(left), eval_right);
351 
352  return op_(std::forward<L>(left), eval_right);
353  }
354 
355  template <
356  typename L, typename R,
357  std::enable_if_t<is_nonarray_lazy_tile_v<L> && is_array_tile_v<R> &&
358  !(left_is_consumable || right_is_consumable)>* = nullptr>
359  auto operator()(L&& left, R&& right) const {
360  auto eval_left = invoke_cast(std::forward<L>(left));
361  auto eval_right = invoke_cast(std::forward<R>(right));
362 
363  if (perm_) return op_(eval_left, eval_right, perm_);
364 
365  // Override consumable
366  if (is_consumable_tile<eval_t<R> >::value && right.is_consumable())
367  return op_.consume_right(eval_left, eval_right);
368 
369  return op_(eval_left, eval_right);
370  }
371 
372 }; // class BinaryWrapper
373 
374 } // namespace detail
375 } // namespace TiledArray
